channel.title: The dangers and ramifications of doxxing and swatting

item.title: The dangers and ramifications of doxxing and swatting
item.author: Theo Jones
item.description: "If there’s one thing we’ve learned from the #Gamergate debate, it’s that people -- on both sides -- are being harassed. I’m not just referring to tweets and emails saying rotten things, but the leaking of personal information for everyone to see, also referred to as doxxing. Even before Gamergate, doxxing and swatting (filing a false report of a critical incident in which response units, including SWAT and bomb squads, are deployed) have been tactics used to harass people in the gaming community -- mostly pro gamers."
